# DARWHIN GOMEZ

**New York, New York**  
**Darwhin88@gmail.com**  |  **929-305-7353**  |  [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

---

## SUMMARY  
Solutions-focused technologist with expertise in cloud architecture and data automation, driving efficiency and insights.

## CORE SKILLS  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight, Bedrock, SageMaker)  
- **Azure:** App Service, Functions, Storage  
- **Data & ML:** Python, SQL, NoSQL, Generative AI  
- **Security:** SIEM, Active Directory, Linux  
- **Automation:** CI/CD, Docker  

## EXPERIENCE  
### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)**, Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
*Jun 2025 – Sep 2025*  
- Designed secure, scalable AWS architectures, enhancing client satisfaction.  
- Automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records, achieving 5× faster feedback loops.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.  

### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies**, Remote, NY  
*Jun 2024 – Sep 2024*  
- Configured Azure environments for application hosting, ensuring compliance and performance.  
- Developed data flow diagrams aligned with governance policies, enhancing project clarity.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**, New York, NY  
*Feb 2024 – May 2024*  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows with Python, reducing manual workload significantly.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access, enhancing system reliability and security.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA**, Remote, NY  
*Feb 2022 – Aug 2023*  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, achieving a 96% graduation rate through data-driven instruction.  

## PROJECTS  
### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Developed FastAPI system for automated resume generation, reducing application time by 60%.  
- Integrated PostgreSQL for job data storage, enhancing retrieval efficiency.
